entry.title: Bitcoin NFT Market to Hit $4.5 Billion by 2025: Galaxy
entry.summary: A report released Friday by analysts suggests that Bitcoin Ordinals’ wild run of the last month is only just the beginning.

entry.title: UK Crypto Crackdown: Which British Banks Allow You to Buy Bitcoin?
entry.summary: It’s getting tougher to buy and sell crypto if you bank in the U.K. These are the latest rules.

entry.title: Sorare NFTs Should Be Regulated Under 'New Category', CEO Says
entry.summary: Regulation may be headed for the NFT market, but Sorare CEO Nicolas Julia says new frameworks are needed.

entry.title: 'I Don’t Trust in Music NFTs': French Electronic Producer DJ Agoria
entry.summary: Mass adoption of music NFTs doesn't appeal to electronic music pioneer DJ Agoria. For him, the rarer the better.

entry.title: Huobi to Join BitTorrent Chain Ecosystem, Build Blockchain 'Super Network'
entry.summary: The crypto exchange will integrate with the cross-chain layer 2 solution linking Ethereum, Tron and BNB Chain.

entry.title: 'We Don't Want to Make Music NFTs Mainstream': DJ Agoria
entry.summary: French electronic music producer DJ Agoria shared with Decrypt what excites him the most about music NFTs, how it informs his work as a generative artist, and why Web3 is all about artists exploring "new ideas that were not possible in Web2."

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Capitulation Has Been 'Completely Different' This Cycle: CoinShares
entry.summary: A CoinShares analyst said the latest downturn has been “completely different” than in the past thanks to orderly capital markets.

entry.title: Tornado Cash Contributor Builds New Privacy Tool—And Hopes It Won’t Trigger the Feds
entry.summary: Ameen Soleimani, an early contributor to Tornado, has created a fork that aims to be a better version of the blacklisted Ethereum coin mixer.

entry.title: What Is Yield Farming? Beginner's Guide
entry.summary: At its core, yield farming is a process that allows cryptocurrency holders to lock up their holdings, which in turn provides them with rewards.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Plunge as Market Mulls Silvergate Fears
entry.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and the wider crypto market were hit hard on Friday morning as the industry weighs concerns around embattled Silvergate.

entry.title: U.S. Lawmakers Say SEC Directive May Bring “Greater Risk of Loss”
entry.summary: Sen. Cynthia Lummis and Rep. Patrick McHenry cite the Celsius bankruptcy in refuting an April 2022 bulletin.

entry.title: Debtors Declare 'Massive Shortfall' in FTX Assets, FTX US Also In the Red
entry.summary: "Their books and records are incomplete and, in many cases, totally absent," writes FTX CEO John J. Ray III.

entry.title: Ethereum Devs Confirm ETH Staking Withdrawals Pushed to April
entry.summary: The network’s much-anticipated Shanghai upgrade, which will enable staked ETH withdrawals, was previously slated for a March release.

entry.title: Growing List of Crypto Companies Cutting Silvergate Ties
entry.summary: Several crypto firms announced separations from the crypto-friendly bank as it delayed an SEC filing and its stock crashed.

entry.title: NFT Sales Surge to $2 Billion in February—Highest Since Terra Crash
entry.summary: The boost, however, is largely due to controversial trading activity on rising NFT marketplace Blur.

entry.title: Tether Has No Exposure to Sinking Crypto Bank Silvergate, Says CTO
entry.summary: The company behind the world's biggest stablecoin has no links to troubled bank Silvergate, according to Tether CTO Paolo Ardoino.

entry.title: Crypto Bank Custodia Is Taking on the Fed—Here’s Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Getting a master account would grant Custodia access to the FedWire network, which surpassed $1 quadrillion worth of transactions for the first time last year.

entry.title: Crypto Influencer Confronted On-Camera Over Alleged Scam
entry.summary: Crypto influencer and alleged scammer Newman Perez has more than 668K followers on Instagram—one of them found him in a shopping center in Colombia.

entry.title: Elon Musk and Tesla Accepting Bitcoin 'Opened Door' for Adidas' Web3 Plans
entry.summary: The EV company's short-lived experiment with Bitcoin helped crypto advocates at Adidas "start the conversation" around blockchain, said its Web3 lead.

entry.title: What Are Liquidity Pools? The Funds That Keep DeFi Running
entry.summary: Without liquidity, financial systems grind to a halt. In decentralized finance (DeFi), liquidity pools help keep things running smoothly.

entry.title: Coinbase Halts Payments With Silvergate Bank
entry.summary: It’s another blow for Silvergate as Coinbase announced that it is no longer accepting payments from the embattled crypto bank.

entry.title: Tezos Token XTZ Leads Weekly Losses With 20% Drop
entry.summary: Though Tezos' native token XTZ has been hit the worst by bearish price action, several other notable layer-1 tokens are also down.

entry.title: How Adidas Jumped Into Web3 and What It Plans Next
entry.summary: Adidas Web3 lead Erika Wykes-Sneyd told Decrypt's Dan Roberts the story of what prompted Adidas to get into crypto (it involves Elon Musk), what the brand has done so far with NFTs tied to physical apparel, and what it's considering next—including token-gated sneaker drops.

entry.title: EU Commissioner Says It’s Time to Define ‘Healthy Competition’ in the Metaverse
entry.summary: As Big Tech eyes opportunities in the metaverse, one EU Commissioner has drawn on concerns in Web2 to protect the next frontier.

entry.title: Emmy-Winning, Disney-Backed Baobab Studios Launches ‘Momoguro’ Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: Momoguro creators have planned a multi-platform franchise with a game, a TV show, and lots of NFTs.

entry.title: Arianee's Mission Is to Mint 10 Million NFTs With 50 Global Brands in 2023
entry.summary: The Arainee CEO has big plans for Web3 and consumer brands, which he believes will be the next gateway to mass adoption.

entry.title: Silvergate Stock Plunges 31% as Crypto Bank Delays SEC Financial Report
entry.summary: Silvergate's stock plunged in the after-hours Wednesday as the crypto-friendly bank delayed filing its 10-K report with the SEC.

entry.title: Wallet Provider Safe Taps Payments Giant Stripe in New Developer Stack Launch
entry.summary: Developers can now leverage Safe’s new software development kit to build Web3 apps with the help of account abstraction.

entry.title: Why 160-Year-Old Luxury Watch Maker Panerai Is Getting into NFTs
entry.summary: Eva Assayag, Web3 lead at Panerai, sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about Panerai's Web3 strategy, which will soon include a "digital passport" sold with every watch.

entry.title: NFT Factory President: 'NFTs Will Be Active in a Bull or Bear Market'
entry.summary: John Karp, president of NFT Factory Paris and the founder of Non-Fungible Conference Lisbon, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the exploding Web3 community in Paris, the concept behind creating a physical gallery for NFTs, and how the existing art community understands NFTs because "everybody understands art."

entry.title: What Attracted Artist Tom Sachs to NFTs? Community and Identity
entry.summary: Tom Sachs is a conceptual artist whose work has been displayed in museums and galleries all over the world, but he told Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris he never before felt part of an art movement—until he got into NFTs and Web3. He talked about Rocket Factory and the pull of Web3 art communities.

entry.title: Arianee CEO: Big Consumer Brands Are Going to Take Web3 to 1 Billion Users
entry.summary: Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel, CEO of Arianee, which offers enterprise software to consumer brands to help them launch NFTs tied to physical goods, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how much the NFT space is growing despite the bear market, how big consumer brands will take crypto mainstream, and how loyalty programs are going to be the next huge use case for NFTs.

entry.title: Salesforce Web3 Lead: Every Brand's Web Site Will Support Crypto Wallets
entry.summary: Salesforce's Web3 lead Marc Mathieu sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about the CRM giant's crypto strategy, why "we had to" embrace Web3, and why the crypto wallet is "the new cookie" online.

entry.title: Australia Announces CBDC Pilot and Study for the eAUD
entry.summary: The Reserve Bank of Australia will work with the private sector to explore more than a dozen use cases.

entry.title: Doodles CEO: Why In-Person Meetups Are Crucial for NFT Communities
entry.summary: Doodles CEO Julian Holguin, former president of Billboard, sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the strong vibes at the event and the importance of IRL meetups in Web3, what's next for Doodles and the community, and his prediction that many newer projects won't survive the crypto winter.

entry.title: SuperRare Co-Founder: We Remain Committed to NFT Artist Royalties
entry.summary: SuperRare co-founder Jon Perkins sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about the debate over artist royalties, SuperRare's roots in catering to artists, and building through a bear market.

entry.title: 'Crypto Can Save the Capitalist Narrative': Animoca Chairman Yat Siu
entry.summary: The Web3 entrepreneur believes crypto's current PR problem is owed to its association with capitalism—but it's not one the industry should shy away from, he says.

entry.title: Nouns 3D-Printed Fashion Collection Turns Heads at NFT Paris
entry.summary: The Nouns DAO funded the project, which used 3D-printed materials to develop apparel based on the NFT-based open-source IP.

entry.title: ‘Our Interests Are Aligned' With the SEC: Coinbase CEO
entry.summary: Exchange executive Brian Armstrong said his firm is interested in bringing digital assets inside the SEC’s “regulatory perimeter.”

entry.title: Snoop Dogg Joins Crypto Casino Roobet as ‘Chief Ganjaroo Officer’
entry.summary: The iconic rapper takes his next step into Web3, this time with crypto gambling.

entry.title: gm: Meet the Brain Behind Avalanche
entry.summary: Avalanche founder and Ava Labs CEO Emin Gun Sirer has been working on proof-of-work cryptocurrencies since before Bitcoin (seriously). He talked to Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott about how Avalanche avoided FTX and how much damage SBF has done to crypto’s image with VCs, why institutions still aren’t backing away from crypto, why Avalanche will succeed in the long run, and trying to cater to both Wall Street institutions and DeFi degens. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Former Metamask Lead Releases HyperPlay Web3 Game Launcher
entry.summary: The gaming gateway eschews Apple's fee model in favor of monetizing "convenience features."

entry.title: Voyager Clients Vote 97% in Favor of $1B Restructuring Plan
entry.summary: The plan would see Binance's U.S. entity acquire Voyager Digital's assets for $1.02 billion, a deal outlined back in December.

entry.title: Decentralized Twitter Spin-Off Bluesky Now on App Store in Beta
entry.summary: The federated spin-off Bluesky backed by the Twitter founder is now on the App store, but users need to invite to try the beta.

entry.title: Move-to-Earn App Stepn to Launch Suite of New Features ‘Soon’: COO
entry.summary: Stepn’s COO said that the app will be rolling out new features soon after what has been a bumpy ride for the project.

entry.title: FTX Survivor LedgerX Dumps Silvergate for Signature Bank: Report
entry.summary: Crypto derivatives platform LedgerX told customers it would now be using Signature Bank for its domestic wire transfers.

entry.title: France Moves Ahead With Tighter Crypto Rules for New Entrants
entry.summary: New entrants to the French market will face stricter regulations, but existing players will have more time to comply.

entry.title: The Metaverse Needs to Be 'Open' Unlike Fortnite, Roblox: The Sandbox COO
entry.summary: The right to digital ownership is just one piece of the open metaverse. Users must also be able to bring their assets wherever they want.

entry.title: Founder of The Sandbox: 'Essential' to Metaverse That Users Own Their Digital Content
entry.summary: Sebastien Borget, founder and COO of the metaverse realm The Sandbox, sat down wit Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the future of the open metaverse and true digital ownership, what's next for The Sandbox, and its current user numbers and stats.

entry.title: Playboy's Next Step in Web3: MetaMansion in The Sandbox
entry.summary: Playboy's Web3 lead Liz Suman sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to tell the story of how the 70-year-old magazine brand got into Web3 and preview its upcoming MetaMansion in The Sandbox, which will give special access privileges to those with a Playboy Rabbitar NFT.

entry.title: Coinbase Shares Up 6% Since Unveiling Layer-2 Ethereum Network Base
entry.summary: The exchange’s Ethereum Layer-2 network is aimed at courting developers of decentralized applications.

entry.title: Orange Comet Raises Over $7 Million in New Funding for NFT Media Play
entry.summary: The digital entertainment platform plans to expand its already notable offerings.

entry.title: Orange Comet CEO: 'We're Trying to Build the Disney of Web3'
entry.summary: Dave Broome, CEO of NFT design and production studio Orange Comet, spoke to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how his company takes "large, popular IP" and turns it into NFT content and Web3 worlds around it.

entry.title: Worldwide Web Founder: What NFT Gaming 'Should Be and Will Be'
entry.summary: Worldwide Webb is a gaming realm that lets you turn your NFT PFPs (Punks, Apes, Doodles and so on) into playable avatars. Founder Thomas Webb spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how the game works, the $10m Series A funding it just received, and why he expects we'll soon see NFT games that show what NFT gaming can do in its best form.

entry.title: Yat Siu of Animoca Brands: 'The Future of Crypto and Web3 Is Culture'
entry.summary: Animoca Brands chairman Yat Siu spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the open metaverse, NFTs and gaming, building through a bear market, and why Animoca believes the future of the industry is culture and gaming.

entry.title: COO of Move-to-Earn App STEPN: 'We're Thriving, Not Just Surviving'
entry.summary: Shiti Manghani, COO of Stepn, the app that lets users earn tokens for exercising, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about Stepn's current health, its plans to addnew achievement systems for the top users, and parent company Finding Satoshi Labs and its plans to launch more apps.

entry.title: gm: Ryan Wyatt on Polygon’s Winning Streak
entry.summary: Polygon Labs President Ryan Wyatt, the former YouTube Gaming head, helped turn Polygon into one of the crypto industry’s rare winners in 2022. In a lively chat with Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward, he revealed why the promise of digital ownership pushed him from the gaming world into crypto, and how Polygon has pulled giants like Starbucks, Reddit, and Instagram into Web3. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: NFT Paris Founder Alexandre Tsydenkov Previews 2023 Event
entry.summary: NFTs take over Paris on February 23. Decrypt's Stephen Graves interviews NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov about this year's conference, which features speakers from many of the top collections and companies in the space, plus lots of side events. Decrypt will be on hand as a media partner, conducting interviews and moderating panels. See you in France!

entry.title: 'Words with Friends' Creator Paul Bettner: Web3 Can Solve Twitch's Limitations
entry.summary: Paul Bettner tells Decrypt about the challenges he faced while developing his Web3 game "Wildcard."

entry.title: 'Words with Friends' Creator Paul Bettner on Why He's Building His Next Game 'Wildcard' in Web3
entry.summary: Paul Bettner shares his perspective on Web3 gaming platforms and his vision to make games everywhere and anywhere players want them.
